title: Looking for a telephone keypad font
content:
I guess it might be considered more of a dingbat or symbol type of font..but I'm wondering if anyone is familiar with a font that looks like the number/letter keypad of a touchtone phone.   
ie:   
a bevelled square surrounding   
1   
2 ABC   
3 DEF   
4 GHI   
5 JKL   
   
etc..   
   
Need to buy one for a flash project.   
Thanks for any help
author: dombort
